instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open the Chrome app . Tap More and then Settings . Under "Advanced," tap Privacy and then Clear browsing data . Choose a time range, like Last hour or All time . Select the types of information you want to remove. Tap Clear data .

Navigate to Settings > Apps & notifications > See all X apps > and find the Google Play Store . On the app s page, choose Storage and then Clear storage or Clear data . Repeat this process for Google Play Services . You may need to tap the Menu button in the corner and choose Show system to reveal it. Restart your phone.

Open Settings and choose Apps & notifications . Tap See all X apps and find the Google Play Store app in the list. Choose Disable from the following menu. Disabling system apps does not uninstall them, but rather replaces them with original the version that came with your phone. Restart your device.
